record.name: Initialize display category list for different phase

rule.conditionDesc: ( Phase in CurrentRecord = "expired" OR Phase in CurrentRecord = "agreed")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">expired</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">agreed</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Phase in CurrentRecord = "expired" OR Phase in CurrentRecord = "agreed"))

rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="draft" or current.phase in $L.file="review" or current.phase in $L.file="abandon"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Phase in CurrentRecord = "draft" OR Phase in CurrentRecord = "review" OR Phase in CurrentRecord = "abandon")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">draft</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">review</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">abandon</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Phase in CurrentRecord = "draft" OR Phase in CurrentRecord = "review" OR Phase in CurrentRecord = "abandon"))
